Examples¶

Runnable examples and quick-start scripts¶

This page lists small examples and links to the notebook-based examples included in the repository.

  • run_simple example

Notebook examples¶

The repository also includes two example notebooks at the top-level:

  • run_folps_numpy.ipynb

  • run_folps_jax.ipynb

Open these in Jupyter or Colab to run the longer, interactive examples.
